explains: n. 流出；流出量；流出物
wordGroup: cash outflow 现金流出；现金支出

sentences.en: There was a net outflow of about $650m.
sentences.cn: 净外流量大约是6亿5千万美元。

sentences.en: There was a capital outflow of $22 billion in 1998.
Outflow channels are probably relics of catastrophic flooding on Mars long ago.
sentences.cn: 流出通道可能是很久以前火星上发过洪水的遗迹。
